original_text: And when they had mocked him, they stripped him of the purple cloak and put his own clothes on him. And they led him out to crucify him.
korean_text: 희롱을 다 한 후 자색 옷을 벗기고 도로 그의 옷을 입히고 십자가에 못 박으려고 끌고 나가니라

sentences.original_text: And when they had mocked him,
they stripped him of the purple cloak
and put his own clothes on him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그에게 그의 옷을 다시 입혔습니다.
